title: Deck of emergency
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

The **deck of emergency** is an [archetype deck](/Decks#Archetype_decks "Decks") that is not found as an independent item in the game. It is used in the construction of the [physical decks](/Decks#Composition "Decks").

| Component cards by version                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| pre-[0.14](/0.14 "0.14")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | [0.14](/0.14 "0.14")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | [0.15](/0.15 "0.15")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | [0.16](/0.16 "0.16") - [0.18](/0.18 "0.18")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [the Banshee](/Banshee_card "Banshee card") [Damnation](/Damnation_card "Damnation card") [Flight](/Flight_card "Flight card") [Solitude](/Solitude_card "Solitude card") [the Tomb](/Tomb_card "Tomb card") [Warpwright](/Warpwright_card "Warpwright card") | [the Alchemist](/Alchemist_card "Alchemist card") [the Banshee](/Banshee_card "Banshee card") [Damnation](/Damnation_card "Damnation card") [Flight](/Flight_card "Flight card") [Solitude](/Solitude_card "Solitude card") [the Tomb](/Tomb_card "Tomb card") [Warpwright](/Warpwright_card "Warpwright card") | [the Alchemist](/Alchemist_card "Alchemist card") [the Banshee](/Banshee_card "Banshee card") [Damnation](/Damnation_card "Damnation card") [the Elixir](/Elixir_card "Elixir card") [the Shaft](/Shaft_card "Shaft card") [the Tomb](/Tomb_card "Tomb card") | [the Alchemist](/Alchemist_card "Alchemist card") [the Banshee](/Banshee_card "Banshee card") [the Cloud](/Cloud_card "Cloud card") [Damnation](/Damnation_card "Damnation card") [the Elixir](/Elixir_card "Elixir card") [the Shaft](/Shaft_card "Shaft card") [the Tomb](/Tomb_card "Tomb card") |

## History

The concept of archetype decks was removed in the major simplification of decks in [0.19](/0.19 "0.19").

## See also

- [Cards](/Cards "Cards")
- [Decks](/Decks "Decks")

Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.

The deck of emergency is an archetype deck that is not found as an independent item in the game. It is used in the construction of the physical decks.
